1598480.name: RPG Sounds - Desert Dungeon - Sound Pack - Michael Ghelfi Signature
1598480.description:
Michael Ghelfi is a music composer and sound designer from Switzerland. Michael keeps expanding the most immersive and complete ambiance library ever made. Michael Ghelfi and RPG Sounds have partnered up to bring you the best auditive experience.
Learn more about Michael Ghelfi at

Desert Dungeon is an RPG Sounds pack by Michael Ghelfi of ambient sounds and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Cursed Desert
  • Desert Cave
  • Desert Dragon Lair
  • Calm (Daduk)
  • Calm
  • Deeper (Daduk)
  • Deeper (Ghosts)
  • Deeper
  • Sand Filling Room (Trap Only)
  • Sand Filling Room
  • Sandstorm

SFX
  • Small Landslide
  • Tombstone
1598480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
